0.Pros: Managers and employees are very helpful in teaching you how to work for the company. Just ask anyone for help and they are there for you helping you.
0.Cons: The person in charge of employee's hours do not do a very good job. We are mostly under staff most of the time, or we have way to many employees per shift which is rare. I usually have to do two to three stations alone. Sometimes I dont even get my break to relax and refuel myself.
